Name: One Dreamer
About the game: Help Frank, a burnt out indie game developer, rediscover his love for video games while struggling to release his debut title. Reprogram objects, fix bugs and solve coding puzzles as you journey through the story of One Dreamer. A narrative-driven, emotional story about the gruelling development process behind making an indie game. Realistic, but easy to understand pseudocode puzzles based on C#. Edit over 350 snippets of code from Frank's toaster to playable mini-games. Meet an extensive cast of charming characters, complete with full English voice acting. Explore a wide range of atmospheric, pixel by pixel drawn environments. A beautiful original soundtrack composed over a period of 7 years.
